message: Hello! This is a fantastic product that I'm sure you'll love. Many of my previous customers have been extremely satisfied with their purchases. I assure you, this product is of the highest quality and will meet all your expectations. Trust me, you won't regret buying it!

I appreciate your enthusiasm, but I'd like to wait and see the statistics before making a decision. Can you tell me how many potential buyers have been to your store so far and how many products have been sold? I'd like to get a sense of the overall quality of the products you've had available.
